name: @neurodevs/node-tdd
description: A Node.js framework for test-driven development (TDD)
author: Eric Yates <hello@ericthecurious.com>

scripts.build.ci: yarn run build.tsc && yarn run build.resolve-paths && yarn run lint
scripts.build.dev: yarn run build.tsc --sourceMap ; yarn run resolve-paths.lint
scripts.clean.all: yarn run clean.dependencies && yarn run clean.build
scripts.post.watch.build: yarn run build.copy-files && yarn run build.resolve-paths
scripts.rebuild: yarn run clean.all && yarn install && yarn run build.dev
scripts.resolve-paths.lint: yarn run build.resolve-paths ; yarn run lint
scripts.watch.rebuild: yarn run clean.all && yarn install && yarn run watch.build.dev
